snippet.title: Potion Craft - Official Alchemist Simulator Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
In Potion Craft, you, well, craft potions! It's an alchemy simulator where you assemble ingredients, mix, heat, boil, stir, and otherwise create interesting brews for your customers, all while running your own potion shop with new recipes and experiments. Potion Craft is coming out this year and has a demo available now on Steam.

#SummerofGaming
